channel.title: FunSCAP3~REMAKE
channel.description:
[b]Remember the epic and popular server from 2 year's ago, well now im bring[/b] [size=36pt]FunSCAP3[/size] [b]back and reloaded with all new and improved Feature's but everything else will stay the same untill i am ready to update the server, otherwise your free to enter the server as you would normally we have a test server that is for [BETA] Members coming up here shortly but however the [BETA] Members are selected through the original server... Our downloable client will be ready shortly so you dont need to use a silab webclient or whatever [/b] [center][b] NEW/DELETED FEATURES: 1.NEW AREA:: "FUNAREA" 2.DELETED [s]SILAB COMMANDS[/s] 3.Upcoming:[SLAYER SKILL] 4.NEW Upcoming AREA: [SLAYER TOWER] 5.Command's 6.And More..[/b][/center] [right][b][i]Credit's: Jman 100% Devolper Credit's: Sparrowmg 10% Coder/ New Owner[/i][/b][/right] [b]MEET THE TEAM: NEEDS CLIENT VERSION 317 [ol][li][CODER/OWNER]Sparrowmg[/li] [li][ADMIN]99 everythin[/li] [li][ADMIN]ox[/li] [li][DEVELOPER]jman: Waiting for Approval[/li] [li]Currently looking for more staff[/li][/ol]
[center][b]Reason's you should join: 1. Completely Epic 2. Old School Server - Popular back then 3. New things changing to this server 4. You can request things to put in the server 5. Become part of our staff crew [Maybe] [/b][/center]
[size=18pt][b]ScreenShots [Coming Soon][/b][/size]
[b]How to Connect: Search it in the Server Advertisment Page[/b]

item.title: FunSCAP3~REMAKE
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

sparrowmg1:

Because the staff wouldn’t have anything to do…

What? So you’re going to make your staff depressed and stand in one area for every hour off the day because you want them to have something to do. I see what you did there. I don’t mean to ruin your parade but,

Reason's you should join: 1. Completely Epic - What? 2. Old School Server - Popular back then - Gona get crashed 3. New things changing to this server - Therefore not old skool? 4. You can request things to put in the server - every server has this? 5. Become part of our staff crew [Maybe] - and stand in one area all day

Don’t take this as an attack on your topic, but rather as constructive criticism.

Read full topic

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

To prevent noobs actually killing bigger noobs in a Training area, why not just make it non-wildy?
And good luck with this.

Read full topic

item.title: FunSCAP3~REMAKE
item.dc:creator: @sparrowmg1 sparrowmg1
item.description:
@sparrowmg1 wrote:

[Update]
Added npc to all places to train
Made a kill log
Added a bank in funarea
Added more npc to fun area
added objects to fun area
Changed xp rate slower like “real rs”
Changed max hit to 200

New Rules:
Npc who say No PK AREA are at trainig areas for a reason players who kill a weak player or any other player will get there skills reset

Read full topic
